43 Convenient timing about Virginia Giuffre's "suicide" posted 5 hours ago by CatalystForChange 1 comments award share report block Techno Fog @Techno_Fog • 5h So the Democrat position is that Virginia Giuffre - a victim of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell - was lying under oath when she cleared Trump of wrongdoing. Giuffre can't defend her statements because she committed suicide in April 2025. Convenient timing.
1 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web 23 Ridiculously Cool Gadgets You'll Want to Buy Immediately Trending Gadget 4886Battery 3 points 5 hours ago If I was involved in that mess, or any mess where it's possible that global entities of immense power wanted me dead... I'd sure as hell create a failsafe dead man's switch that mass exposed those wanting me dead, and I'd be vocal about it well after it was in place to keep them afraid.  Obviously, they have access to all digital and financial records, so it would take some planning and you couldn't involve anyone else, but it's possible, and as has been shown time and time again, it's a matter of life or death. permalink award report block reply
